text: Va Ūst, ki şumoro şaʙ hangomi xoʙ rūhatonro megirad ci gunae ki dar vaqti marg memironad va har cī dar rūz kardaed, medonad, on goh ʙomdodon rūhatonro ʙa çismhojaton ʙargardonda şumoro zinda (ʙedor) mesozad, to on hangom, ki muddati muajjani umraton dar dunjo ʙa pojon rasad. Sipas ʙozgaştaton ʙa nazdi Ūst va şumoro dar rūzi qijomat az on cī kardaed, ogoh mesozad, sipas muvofiqi on çazojaton medihad
